title: Pipeline stalled at coordinator - no forwarding to execution
evidence: After 4+ min runtime: price-updates=3179, opportunities=10003 (MAXLEN), execution-requests=2 (1 init msg), execution-results=0. Coordinator consumed 10K+ opportunities but forwarded essentially none to execution.
recommendation: Root cause is RT-001 (missing chains) + RT-004 (unrealistic profits). Fix both to unblock pipeline.

title: Scroll opportunities silently dropped by coordinator chain validation

title: stream:opportunities hit MAXLEN cap (10K) during smoke test
evidence: stream:opportunities length=10003, at the MAXLEN=10000 limit. New opportunities are being trimmed before coordinator can process them.
recommendation: Increase coordinator consumer throughput or increase MAXLEN for opportunities stream

title: DLQ stayed at zero during entire smoke test

evidence: Opportunities have _trace_traceId, _trace_spanId, _trace_serviceName. But since pipeline stalls at coordinator, no trace can be verified end-to-end through execution.
recommendation: Fix pipeline flow to enable end-to-end tracing verification
